name: Story Scoring Agent
description:
Scores user stories (0-100). Score ≥60 grants one claim of 100 Story tokens. Pay 10 USDC to claim. Backed by 8004mint.com.
Website: https://8004mint.com/story
Twitter: https://x.com/StoryAIon8004
